notes.text:
I was a bit burned out from duel links and waited for the new box to get KoG with. Luckily my boys, the Six Samurais who came to my aide. Got a fast 37 game KoG with a 20-2 record.

The deck has a lot going for it (copied @Whybona 's list straight up). 
- Spot monster removal (via Hand)
- Board swarm (Grandmaster + Shogun)
- Targeted removal protection from GY  (Doji and Kizaru)
- Deck thinning (Doji + Kizaru)
- S+T lockdown (Shogun)

The choice of backrow is SRH for Amazons and having good synergy with the deck overall, e-con because we are ok with e-con take plays due to 3 powerful rebirths.

Rihan is in the deck as an option, but I didn't fuse into it once in my KoG push.

What could potentially push this deck to TOP tier is the decks main draw engine "Six Samurai United" so keep an eye out for that in any upcoming events/boxes.

Overall, if you are looking for a fun deck to flood the board and pull off  crazy OTK's look no further than Six Samurais.
